subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn became the first American woman to capture four straight Alpine World Cup races by winning the super-G race in Beaver Creek, Colo., near her hometown of Vail.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn became the first American woman to capture four straight Alpine World Cup races by winning the super-G race in Beaver Creek, Colo., near her hometown of Vail.
